Why did not Avdol's flames sense him?
I must correct your arrogant belief that you can defeat Lord Dio.
I shall scatter you throughout my dimension of darkness.
that Polnareff's Stand was so fast, or could attack at this distance.
Episode 43 The Miasma of the Void, Cool Ice, Part 2
Just when I thought the illusion had gone away,
I heard the sound of a wall breaking somewhere in the mansion.
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
Could it be Avdol and Polnareff?
I know I hit him, b-but he is not dead...
They suddenly shrank and disappeared into their dimension.
The user and the Stand both...
You are the one who said...
You said if something happened, we had to think of ourselves first.
You said you would not save me.
Ever since India, all you have done is meddle in other people's problems!
You should have just left me alone!
If I had not crouched down just then, I would have been killed.
Is fate telling me to live on?
Is Avdol's will telling me to fight?
It is too dangerous to stay in this room.
That is the door we came in.
But we cannot go out that way.
Avdol sacrificed himself to save us.
Because he believed that we could defeat Dio.
I cannot betray the trust of someone like that!
Running away now is what a loser would do.
I am running to get to that bastard, Dio!
Let us run straight to him!
And I thought they would go for the exit.
I am impressed that he managed to injure me.
It is indeed true that Polnareff
has a mindset that allows him to conquer fear and face danger.
Without a doubt, I will corner and kill him.
My Stand is far stronger than he is.
The inside of his Stand's mouth is a dimension of darkness?!
I cannot even imagine what that dimension is like,
but it let us him get close without any sounds, smells, or other signs of life.
How am I supposed to beat that guy?
He cannot come through without breaking a hole in the wall.
What I do know is that
the moment he shows himself from that dimension of darkness
is when we will have our chance to kill him.
I will cut you in half!
Right now, my Chariot is incredibly fast.
Because of how angry I am at losing Avdol!
H-He is in the crack under my foot?!
First, I have taken your foot,
so you will not be able to run around or escape!
The sound of another wall breaking!
Yeah, there is no doubt about it.
Avdol and the others are in this mansion, and they are fighting.
You managed to hide during the confusion, Polnareff.
With that foot, you cannot go far.
You are probably under some rubble nearby.
Without a doubt, I will defeat you.
What is all this noise, Cool Ice?
Polnareff and that dog are hiding nearby.
You need not personally trouble yourself with this, Lord Dio.
The fake Dio we made using The Fool tricked him.
Usually, I would feel guilty about attacking someone from behind like a coward,
but since that is how you killed Avdol, I do not feel even a shred of pity!
It is exactly how you deserve to die!
and split him open to the hip, like a mackerel!
Sunlight streams through this room's windows.
The real Lord Dio would never
leave his room to enter this place.
The real Lord Dio told me he trusts me, and that he would leave this to me!
So, no matter what happens, he would never descend to this second floor!
He is going to kill Iggy!
Iggy will be swallowed up by that dimension of darkness!
You made me destroy an image of Lord Dio!
He did not use his dimension of darkness!
He punched Iggy across the room without killing him!
Even if it was a fake Lord Dio made of sand,
how dare you make me strike him?!
I will kick you to death, you bastard!
It takes but an instant to be swallowed by my dimension of darkness!
That is not enough time for my anger to wane!
You are the one who has angered me!
Cool Ice is not right in the head.
He is mad that he had to attack Dio's image?
His mind itself is the dimension of darkness!
His mind is the black abyss that rips everything apart!
that we cannot underestimate the power of human resolve.
But you are no more than a filthy dog!
You do not have resolve, or a proud soul, or anything like it!
Our fake Dio made of your sand Stand failed,
but your sand gave me a hint.
I have figured out a way to read his movements!
I can see the route he is taking!
When you use your dimension to move,
you have to swallow up whatever's in your path.
Swallow the sand and head this way, you shithead!
And when your rotten, stinking mouth appears, that is when
appears when you try to confirm my location.
You have got to poke your head out of your dimension of darkness,
or you cannot see what is outside!
Suck on my sword until you die, you piece of shit!
I pierced your brain stem through your throat, damn it!
I do not have time to suffer pain.
Whatever it takes, I will kill you!
Whatever it takes, I will swallow up Iggy and kill Joestar and the others!
You have pulled your sword free.
This time, I will send you to hell!
Is this the vile arm that stabbed me?
I had no choice but to shove him away!
But I do not have time to think about pain, either.
And I was so close to finishing him, too!
He is crazy, but he is completely obsessive about serving Dio!
I cannot let that overwhelm me!
I cannot die until I kill you, either!
I cut him, but he swallowed the tip of my sword!
It is impossible to attack him when he is in his dimension of darkness.
I am just going to get being swallowed up.
He is swallowing up everything in his path.
Since he knows I could attack him,
he is decided to just guess where I might be and strike anywhere and everywhere!
At this rate, he will hit me for sure.
I have to pull back Chariot.
A bunch of broken bones are piercing his lungs...
N-No... I had the wrong idea!
He is moving around in circles,
and the circles keep getting smaller.
He is on a path like a cyclone...
No, like a mosquito repellent coil, closing in on me!
Even if he does not show up
to see where I am, he will hit me eventually!
I am caught in his trap.
A-Am I going to be able to dodge him with this leg?
I-I have got to dig through the floor and get away.
I do not have enough time!
But he is going to keep closing in,
like a needle on a record.
In about five more rounds, he will be here!
How am I going to dodge when I have this hole in my leg?

He will not be able to dodge.
I would like to choose answer 2, but I cannot count on it.

Answer 1 The handsome Polnareff suddenly thinks of a counterattack.
Answer 2 His friends will come save him.
He will not be able to dodge.
There is no way Mr. Joestar and the others,
who entered the mansion ten minutes earlier,
would show up in the next couple of seconds
and save me at the last minute.
For all I know, Mr. Joestar and the others
are struggling in their battle, too.
Looks like answer 1 is the only option.
Pull me out of the circle as hard as you can!
The answer he is been left with is 3.
My Silver Chariot is a Stand that cuts things with a sword.
Now that I am so badly injured, it does not have the power to pull my weight.
If you move or use any more of your Stand's power,
your broken bones will pierce further into your lungs, and you will die!
What are you trying to act all tough for, you idiot?!
Are you trying to save me so you can die along with me?
I am the one who is going to look cool saving you!
You have to survive and warn Mr. Joestar and the others about this bastard.
The important thing is to defeat him!
Avdol saved me, but you do not need to save me, too!
If we all die, it is over!
One more time around, and he will come right to me.
This blood is not your doing.
I do not know the details.
I have really bad luck with friends...
Not to the likes of you!
I only realize it after they are gone...
